Lookup table

Source: vignettes/lookup-table.Rmd
lookup-table.Rmd
library(legiscanrr)
names(lookup_table)
#> [1] "stateID"          "billStatusDict"   "billProgressDict"
#> [4] "billTypeDict"     "billTextTypeDict" "billSponsorDict" 
#> [7] "mimeTypeDict"

States ID

head(lookup_table$stateID)
#> # A tibble: 6 x 3
#>   state_id state state_name
#>      <int> <chr> <chr>     
#> 1        1 AL    Alabama   
#> 2        2 AK    Alaska    
#> 3        3 AZ    Arizona   
#> 4        4 AR    Arkansas  
#> 5        5 CA    California
#> 6        6 CO    Colorado
tail(lookup_table$stateID)
#> # A tibble: 6 x 3
#>   state_id state state_name     
#>      <int> <chr> <chr>          
#> 1       47 WA    Washington     
#> 2       48 WV    West Virginia  
#> 3       49 WI    Wisconsin      
#> 4       50 WY    Wyoming        
#> 5       51 DC    Washington D.C.
#> 6       52 US    US Congress

Bill status ID

knitr::kable(lookup_table$billStatusDict)
status_id status_desc
0 NA
1 Introduced
2 Engrossed
3 Enrolled
4 Passed
5 Vetoed
6 Failed

2 Engrossed

8 Chaptered
9 Refer
10 Report Pass
11 Report DNP
12 Draft
